inclusion.criterion: ≥ 3 branches with the stenotic rate > 70% involved
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: high degree of organ insufficiency: NYHF III~IV
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Acute or chronic active infections including tuberculosis, hepatitis virus, etc.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Other autoimmune diseases including systemic lupus erythematosus, Behcet disease, IgG4
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has severe aortic stenosis with worsening LV function, EF was 25%. He underwent cardiac cath and right heart cath without showing flow-limiting coronary artery disease.
